mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: certain pollens are more likely to cause an allergic reaction than anothers.

options.a: certain pollens are more likely to cause an allergic reaction than anothers.
options.b: certain pollens are more likely to cause an allergic reaction than other
options.c: certain pollens are more likely to cause an allergic reaction than another
options.d: certain pollens are more likely to cause an allergic reaction than others.
